AF.Description: Condition Based Maintenance for Pumps with Asset Based PI

AFDatabase.Name: GEN_FINAL_BASIC_PumpConditionBasedMaintenance
AFDatabase.Description: Condition Based Maintenance for Pumps with Asset Based PI

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Horsepower
AFAttributeTemplate.ConfigString: SELECT [Horsepower (BHP)] FROM [OSIDemo_Pump Manufacturer Information] WHERE Manufacturer = @Manufacturer

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Installation Date
AFAttributeTemplate.ConfigString: SELECT [Installation Date] FROM [OSIDemo_CMMS Data (Maintenance Information)] WHERE [Serial Number] = '%Element%'

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Pump Type
AFAttributeTemplate.ConfigString: SELECT Type FROM [OSIDemo_Pump Manufacturer Information] WHERE Manufacturer = @Manufacturer

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Serial Number
AFAttributeTemplate.ConfigString: SELECT [Product Name] FROM [OSIDemo_Pump Manufacturer Information] WHERE Manufacturer = @Manufacturer

AFAnalysisRule.VariableMapping: Efficiency||Calculated Efficiency;[GUID]||{eacb4b13-0dc2-44fa-bf31-3d327fa59ffd};AverageTemp||Daily Average Bearing Temperature;[GUID]||{e97a8867-d8e0-4e68-81f9-1b188a4772d4};HourlyMaxFlow||Hourly Maximum Discharge Flow Rate;[GUID]||{64e4a430-311b-4f1e-9a88-93abda1a1f08};[GUID]||[UNSET];

AFAnalysisRule.ConfigString: PumpStatusCalc := IF '{87f2c109-39aa-4113-a30a-3cd7e7dba40c};Current Draw' > 1 AND '{449a6ea1-16b5-4547-b62d-107e54b8589b};Pump Status' = "OFF" THEN "ON" ELSE IF '{87f2c109-39aa-4113-a30a-3cd7e7dba40c};Current Draw' < 1 AND '{449a6ea1-16b5-4547-b62d-107e54b8589b};Pump Status' = "ON" THEN "OFF" ELSE IF '{87f2c109-39aa-4113-a30a-3cd7e7dba40c};Current Draw' > 1 AND '{449a6ea1-16b5-4547-b62d-107e54b8589b};Pump Status' = "ON" THEN NoOutput() ELSE IF '{87f2c109-39aa-4113-a30a-3cd7e7dba40c};Current Draw' < 1 AND '{449a6ea1-16b5-4547-b62d-107e54b8589b};Pump Status' = "OFF" THEN NoOutput() ELSE IF TagBad('{449a6ea1-16b5-4547-b62d-107e54b8589b};Pump Status','*') THEN "OFF" ELSE NoOutput();

AFAnalysisRule.VariableMapping: LastMaintRuntime||RunHours Since Maintenance;[GUID]||{6961f882-37ca-4297-a2c0-070346b46815};InstallationRuntime||RunHours Since Installation;[GUID]||{23fa3266-025b-4255-b06e-8f2881fea68a};NumberofStarts||Number of Starts Since Maintenance;[GUID]||{cf4a9e07-99d4-4126-bb61-f4510f0722e2};[GUID]||[UNSET];

AFNotificationTemplate.Name: CBM - Pump Runtime Limit for Maintenance
AFNotificationTemplate.Description: Notification for pump runtime is greater than pump runtime limit
